title: Average spend of eating out for lunch in the U.S. 2015
summary: This bar chart has 3 categories for the x axis representing Days, and a y axis representing Average cost in U.S. dollars.
The highest category is found at Per_year where Average cost in U.S. dollars is 1043.0.
The lowest category is found at Per_day where Average cost in U.S. dollars is 11.14.
